data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pedro, Silvia R. M., Camargo, João M. F. (2009): Neotropical Meliponini: the genus Leurotrigona Moure — two new species (Hymenoptera: Apidae, Apinae). Zootaxa 1983: 23-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185346
